Posts.EditableText: Are the players able to cut off the sound to the game? I couldn't find an option with the game on. Or is it possible to create that option? I don't wanna force my music on people.
Posts.HTML: Are the players able to cut off the sound to the game? I couldn't find an option with the game on. Or is it possible to create that option? I don't wanna force my music on people.

Posts.EditableText: Yes, in the Quest options it's possible for the player to turn off all sounds and music in a game.
Posts.HTML: Yes, in the Quest options it's possible for the player to turn off all sounds and music in a game.
